casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

January, 1961

(January 5, 1961) Joseph H. Saint et al., Appellants, v. Bell Aircraft Corporation, Respondent.

Order unanimous affirmed, without costs of this appeal to any party. (Cf. Arsenault v. General Elec. Co., 147 Conn. 130, cert. denied 364 U. S. 815.) (Appeal from order of Erie Special Term, staying plaintiffs from prosecuting trial of the action.) Present — Bastow, J. P., Goldman, Halpern, McClusky and Henry, JJ.
